div.p: YOU GET ATTACKED, THAT'S IT, YOU'RE GONE.
FINALLY, A NEW HIGH-TECH SUPER WHEELCHAIR GREATLY HELPING U.S.
MILITARY PEOPLE WHO LOST LIMBS FIGHTING IN IRAQ AND
AFGHANISTAN. THE SO-CALLED TRACK CHAIRS COST
ABOUT $15,000 EACH. MANY BUSINESS PEOPLE HAVE
EMAILED ME WANTING TO UNDERWRITE A CHAIR OR TWO.
THAT IS FABULOUS, BECAUSE THESE CHAIRS BRING A SENSE OF FREEDOM
TO OUR WOUNDED VETS, BECAUSE THEY CAN LITERALLY GO ANYWHERE.
HERE'S THE ADDRESS WHERE YOU CAN HELP OUT --
WE WILL HAVE A MAJOR ANNOUNCEMENT ABOUT THIS PROGRAM
NEXT WEEK. MY NEWSPAPER COLUMN POSTED ON
BILLOREILLY.COM DEALS WITH THE TRACK CHAIR.
MORE THAN 1700 AMERICAN SOLDIERS LOST LIMBS FIGHTING AGAINST
"FACTOR" TIP OF THE DAY. THAT IT FOR US TONIGHT.
WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO SPOUT OFF ABOUT "THE FACTOR" FROM ANYWHERE
